languages.text: {n}Кассия задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Пришло время самого важного урока, Лорд-капитан. Благодаря вам я здесь — и ко всему готова".
{n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Пришло время самого важного урока, Лорд-капитан. Благодаря вам я здесь — и ко всему готова".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

{n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅沉思般地点点头。{/n}“是时候上最重要的一课了，舰长大人。多亏了你，我已经准备好面对任何事情了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅沉思般地点点头。{/n}“是时候上最重要的一课了，舰长大人。多亏了你，我已经准备好面对任何事情了。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente, pensativa.{/n} «Es hora de la lección más importante de todas, Lord Capitán. Gracias a usted, estoy aquí, lista para hacer frente a lo que nos espere».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente, pensativa.{/n} «Es hora de la lección más importante de todas, Lord Capitán. Gracias a usted, estoy aquí, lista para hacer frente a lo que nos espere».

languages.text: {n}カシアはしみじみと頷く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、一番重要な教訓がございます。陛下のおかげで、あたくしは今ここにいて、そして準備万端なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはしみじみと頷く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、一番重要な教訓がございます。陛下のおかげで、あたくしは今ここにいて、そして準備万端なのです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Es ist Zeit für die wichtigste aller Lektionen, Lord Captain. Dank Euch bin ich hier und bin für alles bereit."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt nachdenklich.{/n} "Es ist Zeit für die wichtigste aller Lektionen, Lord Captain. Dank Euch bin ich hier und bin für alles bereit."

languages.text: {n}Cassia hoche la tête d'un air songeur.{/n} « L'heure de la plus importante leçon de toutes est arrivée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Grâce à vous, je suis ici, fin prête à braver tous les dangers. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hoche la tête d'un air songeur.{/n} « L'heure de la plus importante leçon de toutes est arrivée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Grâce à vous, je suis ici, fin prête à braver tous les dangers. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, dalgın bir edayla onaylıyor.{/n} "Şimdi sırada tüm derslerin en önemlisi var Lord Kaptan. Buradayım ve her şeye hazırım. Senin sayende."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods pensively.{/n} "It is time for the most important lesson of all, Lord Captain. Thanks to you, I am here and ready for anything."
